## Coraz√≥n

\


```yaml { .animate src="img/heart.svg" style="margin: 0 auto; display: block" width=50%}
setup:
  - element: "#heart"
    modifier: function() { this.animate(1500).ease('<>').scale(.8).loop(true,true);}
    parameters: []
``` 


## Camino SVG a Storytelling

```yaml {.animate src="img/modelo-st-6B.svg" }
setup:
  - element: "#peces"
    modifier: attr
    parameters:
      - class: fragment
        data-fragment-index: "0"
  - element: "#texto-1"
    modifier: attr
    parameters:
      - class: fragment fade-in-then-out
        data-fragment-index: "0"
```
